description: Georg Brandl is a Python core developer since 2005. He now cares for Python 3.2 and 3.3 as release manager, and is also responsible for the documentation. He is also the author of the Sphinx documentation system used by most Python projects. In his spare time, Georg works on his degree in physics at the Technical University of Munich.
title: Keynote: Python and Neutrons or, how to make it fun to move motors by Georg Brandl
